entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Three Hills 04:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -12.9°C
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
